text: Hi <@UKGV272KS>, thank you for the additional context. I don't have the exact solution for the level of granularity you need. Would it be possible to create  lists based on each segment individually and these list could even be aggregated in one master list using the List membership filter?

Does anyone know if there's an equivalent of a `var_dump` with HUBL? I'm looking to output tags/categories on the blog listing page but the documentation I'm finding seems to be only showing how to get it for the blog post itself. (<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/blog-content-markup>). And when I output my `{{ content }}` , it doesn't seem to be behaving as I expected. I'd like to see what variables I have access to using.
Have you checked out Developer Info?
in the little HubSpot tools menu that shows up in the top right of pages when youâ€™re logged in?
:face_palm: - I was betting that my answer would be right in front of me as soon as I asked it. Thanks <@U54TVT3C1> - that's the information I was looking for.
No worries!  I was using HubSpot for a looong time before I noticed that goldmine
